title: Invalid Drive D:\
body: So basically I decided to start playing League today because I have many friends who play it. I downloaded the League of Legends setup from the website, and once I booted it up it gave me the error "Invalid Drive D:\". Even though it's on C:\, I even tried putting it onto a flash drive and it gave me the exact same error. How do I fix this?

replies.body: It seems like the installer is failing to recognize your C: drive.  Hit up our tech team by [submitting a ticket,](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can take a deeper look.  Attach the screenshot in the ticket as t's providing some great context to your issue.
